item.title: About the KoDa API
item.description: What is the KoDa API ? The KoDa API provides access to the raw historical data collected from the following TrafikLab APIs: GTFS Regional Static data GTFS Regional Realtime NeTEx Regional Static data Who can access the dataset? Everyone who possess an API key can download (parts) the dataset. Apply for an API key. What period and public transportation authorities (PTAs) are included? The earliest data in the dataset is from February 2020 for the PTAs which data was available by the aforementioned TrafikLab APIs at that time.

item.title: Examples
Usage
item.description: How to use the KoDa API Quick Test To test that the API is live and the server is not down try https://api.koda.trafiklab.se/KoDa/api/v2/hello Normal Usage The API has two primary modes of accessing the data: downloading the historical raw GTFS data as they were retrieved from TrafikLab at the time of download. The KoDa API Swagger documentation lists the available endpoints and query parameters to use for downloading historical data.
